alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:32PM CDT until April 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 431 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over mainly rural areas of Lincoln County , moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported ping pong ball size hail 2 miles southeast of Troy. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Troy, Moscow Mills, Fountain N` Lakes, Chain of Rocks, and Cave. This also includes Cuivre River State Park. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
